Package com.agorapulse.gru.micronaut

Class Micronaut

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agorapulse.gru.micronaut.Micronaut
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Client
    public class Micronaut
extends Object
implements Client
    Client for Micronaut applications. This uses Http client to interact with EmbeddedServer.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  Micronaut.MicronautApplicationBuilder

      • build

        public static Micronaut.MicronautApplicationBuilder build​(Object unitTest)
        Starts building a client using a custom ApplicationContext for this test.
        Parameters:
        unitTest - the current test
        Returns:
        a builder for a client using a custom ApplicationContext

      • create

        public static Client create​(Object unitTest)
        Creates a new client either reusing the existing application context if the unit test implements ApplicationContextProvider or starting a new custom one.
        Parameters:
        unitTest - the current test
        Returns:
        a builder for a client using either existing or a custom ApplicationContext

      • create

        public static Client create​(Client delegate,
                            Object unitTest)
        Creates a new client either reusing the existing application context if the unit test implements ApplicationContextProvider or starting a new custom one.
        Parameters:
        delegate - the delegate client to be used to perform HTTP requests
        unitTest - the current test
        Returns:
        a builder for a client using either existing or a custom ApplicationContext
